H0.text: The Halle Orchestra was founded in which British city. Liverpool

H1.text: The Halle Orchestra was founded in which British city. Birmingham

H2.text: The Halle Orchestra was founded in which British city. Leeds

H3.text: The Halle Orchestra was founded in which British city. Mancs

A4.text: In May 1857, the pianist and conductor Charles Hallé set up an orchestra to perform at the Manchester Art Treasures Exhibition

A5.text: The Hallé is an English symphony orchestra based in Manchester, England

A6.text: Manchester has two symphony orchestras, The Hallé and the BBC Philharmonic, and a chamber orchestra, the Manchester Camerata.
